This is part of a broad field of health care that focuses on the foods you eat and how they affect your health and wellbeing. This approach recognises that each person has different nutritional needs. Why use it A diet tailored to your unique needs and your body's specific requirements may help you achieve optimal health. What to expect A naturopathic nutritionist develops a treatment plan that is focused on a diet of whole food and nutrient-rich food. You will be encouraged to avoid or limit artificial flavours and chemicals. You may also be prescribed specific herbs or supplements. What is the evidence? Clinical evidence supports the use of a healthy diet for good health.
